001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization;
002
003/**
004 * Explicit regularization involves modifying the objective (loss) function directly by adding a penalty or changing the targets.
005 *
006 * @param <N> Number type
007 */
008@Regularization.Mechanism(Regularization.Mechanism.Type.PENALTY_BASED)
009public interface ExplicitRegularization<N extends Number> extends Regularization<N> {
010
011    N lossPenalty(N[] parameters);
012
013    N gradientAdjustment(N parameter);
014
015}
